item.description:
Please join Greater Worcester Humanists on Tuesday, February 12th, when our program will be a panel of six members who will share their experiences as to how they as humanists, atheists, freethinkers, and skeptics navigate the world of believers whether in their families, at school, in the workplace, at public occasions or in the public square.

The panel presentation begins at 7:00 p.m. with social time at 6:30 in Fellowship Hall at the UU Church of Worcester, 90 Holden Street. All are welcome.
item.name: February Meeting: Panel Discussion, Navigating the World of Believers
